features: Green Tea Aqua Soothing Gel Cream: Refreshing lightweight texture for fast absorption and easy application. Apply alone or after applying facial toner to heal, cool, and soothe the skin.
Use as After Su Care: This light green jello-like moisturizer packed with Green Tea Extract is suitable after intense outdoor activity or sun exposure.
Key Ingredients: 6% of Propanediol, 37,500 ppm of Green Tea Leaf Extract, 5,000 ppm of D-Panthenol rich in soothing and healing benefits also helps with skin discoloration and reducing blemishes.
Target redness, blemishes, sunburns, and oily skin: Effective for healing skin sensitized due to heat and sunburns. Can also be used daily in a warm and humid climate.

COSRX Standards: Clean Beauty - All COSRX products are formulated with skin-friendly ingredients that alleviate irritated skin. Hypoallergenic, Dermatologist tested, Cruelty-FREE, Parabens FREE, Sulfates FREE, Phthalates FREEtested, Animal Testing-FREE, Parabens-FREE, Sulfates-FREE, Phthalates-FREE
body.description: Cooling relief for heated angry skin! A gel-like, cooling, non-oily gel cream moisturizer that immerses skin in hydration. It absorbs quickly and delivers instant hydration with a fresh finish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight but hydrating moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: Love this gel moisturizer! I have oily skin but like to stay hydrated without a heavy feeling on my skin especially in the summer. I've tried a few gel moisturizers and had overall good experiences. Some are lighter weight and best used under sunscreen but not at night alone. Others can function as a standalone moisturizer. My fave before now was the missha water full gel cream but I can't find it anymore and it's a bit more expensive. The reason I liked it so much was that it truly HYDRATED my skin, like a cream moisturizer. Not just add a little moisture then feel dry after a few hours. This cosrx moisturizer is the closest I've found to it and it's much more affordable.The consistency is a light gel. Goes on smooth and absorbs after rubbing in. Doesn't leave a filmy heavy feel. But it keeps skin hydrated all day (I use it under my sunscreen during the day) I even use it as a night time moisturizer in the summer and I think I'll be able to continue through the winter! Plus it doesn't break me out. No noticable smell. Can't recommend this enough!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST moisturizer for summer time / oily skin.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this a few months ago and now have an empty bottle. It is a gel formula so its good for oily skin and the summer time for a light weight feel. My skin felt supple and very moisturized, I have sensitive skin so i go toward skincare that has little fragrance and this did not have any smell to it that I noticed.Pros:Light weightHas aloe & green tea for sensitive skinno scentCon:I ran out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soothing and moisturizing!
reviews.reviewText: I tried this cream a few times and definitely enjoyed it. It is not part of my every day or week routine but I throw it in there every once in a while. It's super soothing and hydrating which I love and recommend for anyone with dry skin. DO NOT mix this with other products however. I would use this on its own. I have had my fair share of rashes when trying to use this with other products I have such as acne medications, retinol and even cocoa butter. Just a helpful tip!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very lightweight, good for sensititve skin
reviews.reviewText: I have very sensitive skin and some cystic acne on my chin. I use this during the day under my sunscreen/makeup and again at night under another moisturizer. It is super lightweight so if you have dry skin you could pair this with another moisturizer. I can't speak to its results on skin texture or anything because I have started a whole new skincare routine with several new products so it's difficult to tell what is helping and what isn't, but this moisturizer passes the cosdna.com test (all of the ingredients are safe and do not block pores/cause acne) and I haven't experienced any negative effects from it. I love the gel consistency, it feels like it absorbs fully without much residue left on the skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most refreshing moisturizer for Oily Combo Skin!
reviews.reviewText: I was using too heavy of moisturizer for my oily combo skin and this moisturizer was recommended by a couple skincare specialist so I thought I'd give it a try. When I tell you this moisturizer creates a cool, hydrating sensation I am not joking. It feels amazing when I slather it on my face. My face feels so refreshed and with other moisturizer I look like a shiny grease-ball within two hours but NOT with this moisturizer. I am matte for the most part. Highly recommend trying this out if you have oily-combo skin! It is not too heavy and just what someone with oily skin needs for hydration!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product overall
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a good affordable gel/water cream to replace the belif aqua bomb since it is on the pricier side and this does a wonderful job. It moisturizes well and sinks in fast without leaving a greasy residue. It also does not have a strong sent and it is very light weight but still stops my skin from getting dry throughout the day. A perfect daytime moisturizer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not moisturizing enough for winter
reviews.reviewText: I tried to make this work during the winter but I was getting dry patches and literally started peeling. After a week I had to buy a different moisturizer to replace it. It could work well for the summer so I will hold onto it, because it didn't break me out and I have sensitive acne prone skin, and it feels great on the skin, so I'm hoping it will be perfect for hot months!
It's has gel like texture but doesn't moisture my combo skin. I feel dry even in my T zone.
